definitions: The action of seeing or noticing someone or something.
The action of marking with spots.
The action of placing in a particular spot or position.
The action of identifying or detecting something.
The action of observing or monitoring something.
examples: The birdwatcher enjoyed spotting rare species.
She was spotting errors in the document.
The artist was spotting paint onto the canvas.
He was spotting the weights for his friend.
The security guard was spotting suspicious activity.
